title: deep water horizon
review: Deepwater Horizion is a action packed blockbuster about the accident that occurred in 2010 when a oil rig exploded due to a uncontrollable blowout and ended up killing 11 crewmen and ignited a fireball that could be seen from 40miles away. The cast plays their roles very well in the film and for a film based upon such a event it creates the drama very well.
